item.title: About
item.description: Summary I am a Systems Engineer with 10+ years of experience in planning, designing, implementing and supporting various IT Infrastructure Services. Currently interested in SE/SRE activities and Go programming. Skills Doing now: Development with: Go, Python, Postgres, Redis Runs on: Cloud, Kubernetes, Docker, Linux Automated by: Argo, Git, Gitlab Monitored thru: Grafana, Loki, ELK, Influx, Prometheus Work style: Agile SCRUM, DevOps and ITIL, Confluence Back in a days:
